column5: Here are a few shots from Barrie's lake front.  http://picasaweb.google.ca/robrice72/Canad...244002237231346  http://picasaweb.google.ca/robrice72/Canad...244191686995778  http://picasaweb.google.ca/robrice72/Canad...244192666055282  http://picasaweb.google.ca/robrice72/Canad...244215835434194
Beautiful!  Thanks for sharing those, looks like it was a nice display
Very cool shots!!!  We went to see the local Whitby ones...not as nice as those....LOL

We had a blast tonight... I took photos of Liam with sparklers and video of the fireworks we bought...  Here are a couple of the pictures... and what I think being a kid is all about...  HAVING FUN!!!         Now to edit the HOURS of video from today... we had BIG adventures!  G
Glad you had the pool near by in case of an emergency. lol  Kids big and small eh?

Big and small.... you got that right!!  The pool was part of today adventure... and doubled as an emergency fire extinguisher should the need arise  man did Liam and I have fun today! Spiel brought Brooke over... and I learn a few new things today! what a great dog Brooke is!  Spiel thanks for everything again... see you soon...  KF wicked photos! they had a big one here @ Dofasco Park.... but we had a ton of fun here... in our backyard now the little man is passed out on the couch.. I just wish I looked as peaceful when I pass out! LOL!  G
